snippet.title: The Mechanics of Success and Victory – Sadhguru
snippet.description:
In an address to the Indian Hockey Federation, Sadhguru decodes the mechanics of victory and success. He also narrates an anecdote from the Mahabharat to elucidate the importance of organizing one’s faculties in one direction to win any game.

#Sadhguru #Sports
Yogi, mystic and visionary, Sadhguru is a spiritual master with a difference. An arresting blend of profundity and pragmatism, his life and work serves as a reminder that yoga is a contemporary science, vitally relevant to our times.
